pre_caption: From a high-angle, extreme wide shot, the scene captures a bustling waterside plaza. The Doge's Palace occupies the top right and center of the frame in the middle ground, with a large crowd of people filling the plaza to its left. In the middle ground on the left, two tall columns stand amidst the crowd. The foreground is dominated by the water of the lagoon, while a line of docked gondolas stretches across the bottom of the frame in the middle ground. A single black gondola enters from the right side of the frame and moves leftward across the foreground water. The camera, remaining in its elevated position, subtly pans to the left to follow the gondola's path.
